ValidationRule.description: This validation rule prevents users from updating the Status of a Case back to "New"
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: NOT(ISNEW()) && ISCHANGED(Status) && ISPICKVAL(Status,'NS_New') && NOT($Profile.Name = 'System Administrator') && NOT($Profile.Name = 'OSS Support') && NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Last_Activity_Time__c)) && NOT(ISCHANGED(NS_Counter_Activity__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case Status cannot be updated to a value of New. Please update the Case Status to a different value.
